product_name: Mountaineers Books Mountain Weather: Backcountry Forecasting and Weather Safety for Hikers, Campers, Climbers, Skiers, and Snowboarders
long_description: Jeff Renner, chief meterologist for Seattle's NBC affiliate KING-5 TV, provides easy-to-understand basic meteorology of mountain weather.
short_description: Jeff Renner, chief meterologist for Seattle's NBC affiliate KING-5 TV, provides easy-to-understand basic meteorology of mountain weather.
